attributes.action: never allow any new building in the village of Puckeridge, Hertfordshire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No new buildings should be allowed on any new sites in the village of Puckeridge, in order to preserver the atmosphere and quality of life for all the residence of this peaceful English village, that still has old fashioned values of respect and community that so much of England has lost.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
